jobsplus.gui.jobs.restriction_types: At level %d, this item allows these actions:
jobsplus.gui.jobs.error.not_enough_coins: You do not have enough coins (%s) to start performing this job.
jobsplus.gui.jobs.no_recipes: This job does not have any crafting recipes. Take a look at mods like Jobs+ Tools or create a custom datapack to add crafting recipes to jobs.
jobsplus.gui.powerups.title: Power-ups
jobsplus.gui.confirmation.title: Confirmation
jobsplus.gui.confirmation.purchase_job.f: Are you sure you want to start performing the %s job?
jobsplus.gui.confirmation.purchase_job.p: Are you sure you want to start performing the %s job for %s coins?
jobsplus.gui.confirmation.purchase_power: Are you sure you want to buy the power-up %s for %s coins?
jobsplus.command.arguments.enum.invalid: Enum constant must be one of %s, found %s
jobsplus.command.set.level.success: Set level for job %s to %d for player %s.
jobsplus.command.set.level.success_new_j: Added new job %s and set the level to %d for player %s.
jobsplus.command.set.level.does_not_have: Level cannot be 0 because the player does not have the job.
jobsplus.command.set.experience.success: Successfully set the experience of job %s to %d for player %s.
jobsplus.command.set.experience.experien: The experience cannot be (higher than) the maximum experience for this level (%d).
jobsplus.command.set.coins.success: Successfully set the coins to %d for player %s.
jobsplus.command.set.powerup.success_cle: Successfully cleared all powerups for job %s.
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.alchemist.name: Alchemist
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.alchemist.descript: The alchemist is a master of potions and brewing. Use the Alchemist's powerups to make your potions even stronger!
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.builder.name: Builder
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.builder.descriptio: The builder is a master of building. use the Builder's powerups to take less fall damage. Useful for building tall structures!
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.digger.name: Digger
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.digger.description: The digger is a master of digging dirt, sand, gravel and more. Use the Digger's powerups to dig faster and receive more and better drops!
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.enchanter.name: Enchanter
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.enchanter.descript: The enchanter is a master of enchanting armor and tools. Use the Enchanter's powerups to get more experience for enchanting!
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.farmer.name: Farmer
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.farmer.description: The farmer is a master of farming crops and animals. Use the Farmer's powerups to get more drops from crops!
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.fisherman.name: Fisherman
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.fisherman.descript: The fisherman is a master of fishing. Use the Fisherman's powerups to use your fishing rod as a grappling hook!
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.hunter.name: Hunter
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.hunter.description: The hunter is a master of hunting animals and monsters. Use the Hunter's powerups to master your sword and bow!
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.lumberjack.name: Lumberjack
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.lumberjack.descrip: The lumberjack is a master of chopping wood. Use the Lumberjack's powerups to chop wood faster and receive more drops!
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.miner.name: Miner
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.miner.description: The miner is a master of mining ores and stone. Use the Miner's powerups to mine faster and receive more drops!
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.smith.name: Smith
jobsplus.job.jobsplus.smith.description: The smith is a master of smelting ores and crafting tools. Use the Smith's powerups to make your armor last longer!
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.alchemist.root: The alchemist is a master of potions and brewing. Use the Alchemist's powerups to make your potions even stronger!
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.alchemist.stro: Potions have a 20% change to become stronger.
Potions have a 40% change to become stronger.
Potions have a 60% change to become stronger.
Potions have a 80% change to become stronger.
Potions have a 100% change to become stronger.
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.builder.root.d: The builder is a master of building. use the Builder's powerups to take less fall damage. Useful for building tall structures!
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.digger.root.de: The digger is a master of digging dirt, sand, gravel and more. Use the Digger's powerups to dig faster and receive more and better drops!
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.digger.double_: Grants a 5% chance to get double drops when digging.
Grants a 10% chance to get double drops when digging.
Grants a 20% chance to get double drops when digging.
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.digger.gold_di: Grants a 1% chance to find a gold ingot when digging.
Grants a 3% chance to find a gold ingot when digging.
Grants a 5% chance to find a gold ingot when digging.
Grants a 0.5% chance to find a gold block when digging.
Grants a 1% chance to find a gold block when digging.
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.digger.shovel_: Shovels are 10% less likely to take damage when used.
Shovels are 20% less likely to take damage when used.
Shovels are 30% less likely to take damage when used.
Shovels are 40% less likely to take damage when used.
Shovels are 50% less likely to take damage when used.
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.enchanter.root: The enchanter is a master of enchanting armor and tools. Use the Enchanter's powerups to get more experience for enchanting!
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.enchanter.exp_: Multiply your experience from blocks and mobs by 1.5x
Multiply your experience from blocks and mobs by 2x
Multiply your experience from blocks and mobs by 2.5x
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.farmer.root.de: The farmer is a master of farming crops and animals. Use the Farmer's powerups to get more drops from crops!
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.farmer.double_: Grants a 5% chance to get double drops when harvesting crops.
Grants a 10% chance to get double drops when harvesting crops.
Grants a 20% chance to get double drops when harvesting crops.
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.fisherman.root: The fisherman is a master of fishing. Use the Fisherman's powerups to use your fishing rod as a grappling hook!
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.fisherman.grap: Turns your fishing rod into a grappling hook that can be used to pull you to a location.
Make your grappling hook pull you further.
Make your grappling hook pull you even further.
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.hunter.root.de: The hunter is a master of hunting animals and monsters. Use the Hunter's powerups to master your sword and bow!
jobsplus.powerup.jobsplus.hunter.bow_unb: Bows are 10% less likely to take damage when used.

Bows are 30% less likely to take damage when used.
Bows are 40% less likely to take damage when used.
Bows are 50% less likely to take damage when used.

Arrows have a 50% chance to ignite.
Arrows have a 100% chance to ignite.
